Articles.Content: So I've noticed this for a while now and have been trying to figure it out but can't seem to get my head around it. The original Mechjeb was pretty damn good at transferring to the Mun but in 2.0 it completely ignores aerobraking when using the Hohmann transfer and sends me flying around into the orbit instead. Is there something that I'm doing wrong to confuse Mechjeb somehow? Also is there any way I can just set my node's myself and get Mechjeb to handle the procedure?

There are two different threads going, which are trying to bring mechjeb up to speed too its lastest release. I would read through those.

Also I believe that mechjeb has a bugtracker.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12384-PART-0-21-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-0-9

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/43809-The-MechJeb-Support-Thread-Post-All-MechJeb-Issues-Here
Thanks, posted in the main thread so hopefully the dev will see too
You are not supposed to use Hohmann Transfer on the ground.
